data.text: @nycgov Why get a shot when the virus is way down? I understand if infections were as bad as before. How about if it now just dies out? Who knows what happens next?
@nycgov No. Nope. Never!  and if you are going to advertise, how about presenting the side effects? #InformedConsent
@nycgov No, the children need to be left alone. They're already too terrified to take off their masks...
